title: Hal Clement illustrated
description:
The Illustrated Hal Clement

The Hal Clement's novels and shorts with the original artwork (png, jpg). Usually the artwork which accompanied the novels when they were published as serials. Format, Project Gutenberg type html. Missing 'Festschriften' (convention speeches) and most of the 'science for fiction' essay series. Covers of collected works go with the stories they illustrate. mp3 files as found.
